text:
Оставлял тут отзыв лет 5-6 назад и что-то снова нахлынуло. Очень круто. Особенно круто, когда в первый раз бродишь по локации и постоянно мысль за что-то цепляется. Лезешь в гугл и оказывается, что да, не зря. Если честно, не знал, поначалу, кто композитор и слова поначалу тяжело разобрать.
Офигенно, в общем. Давненько музыка в играх такого удовольствия не доставляла. Там уже задумываешься, что и остальные треки клевые же были. Нет, правда, музыка игру только украшает, что не так уж часто встречается.
author: Роман Ткаченко

author: Stranger

text:
+Kirill Nielsont this song was originally recorded in 1989 for an russian hard-rock project named "Может быть"; (Maybe), They recorded 3 albums in 89-90, but they was never officialy released because of lack of money. Song was originaly named "Кто ты?" (Who are you?). This version has rerecorded music, but vocal ripped from bootleg album, for this reason vocal is very quiet. I think that Tatiana Blinova and Svetlana Granovskaya allowed used they vocals only because of the friendship with Kirill.
It's great that Kirill found way to released his song after all this years.
And yes, you can hear original version in russian social network vk.com, it's named Может Быть – Кто ты
author: Sosagun The Great

text: @Sosagun The Great , thanks for the explaination. Though I can't find the song by these words.
author: Coil u

text: +german u https://vk.com/audios-31894006?album_id=21931492 here is direct link, you have to be logged in vk.com in order to listen it.
author: Sosagun The Great

text: @Sosagun The Great , thanks
author: Coil u

text: @Sosagun The Great Yeah thanks, I didn't know. Though the question why the track was removed from the ED remains. By the way, it sounds way better with Pokrovsky's musical accompaniment.
author: Stranger

text: +Kirill Nielson Tatiana Blinova and Svetlana Granovskaya was vocalists on this track,  Alik Granovsky (he was in Aria and Master with Kirill) was mentioned as "participated in the writing of music" in first album. I think Larian can't or do not want to get legal rigths to use this track from all this people.
author: Sosagun The Great

text: Kirill Pokrovsky will be missed by me, greatly. I am curious on how Larian is going to find another composer who makes music just as good as this.
author: CynicalOverdose

text: @ClumsyWizard it's almost impossible imo, only Jeremy Soule is as great composer as Kirill considering fantasy theme soudtracks but Larian will never have such money to hire him and Soule's music is slightly different though in terms of atmosphere, Pokrovsky was one of a kind, totally unique, for me Divinity will never be the same, music makes 50% of its greatness :(
author: taffer33

text: @taffer33 Jeremy Soule has also grown more generic over the years. Right now there's no distinct difference between him, and Hans Zimmer unless someone points it out to you; with that said. Larian should at least try to pick their talent from a pool of people that have Belgium/Russian descent.
author: CynicalOverdose

text: +ClumsyWizard I miss Kirill too. He compoese done of my all time favorite instrumentals (if one sees the chorus also as an instrument) with Run, Zandalor, Run!
author: Freyja Njordsdottir

text: ClumsyWizard well, basically they didn’t. New soundtracks don’t stand a chance
author: _morgi_

text:
as morgi said... Borislav Slavov is a well known composer but s*cks at giving the feeling of divinity music... the music in D:OS2 ended up all sounding kinda the same.
there are only 2 or 3 excuses in the music that are actually good.
-A tear in the veil
-Lohse's Theme(Sing for Me)
-Ifan's Theme (Mead,Gold and Blood)(think it also played at the end of the game?)
All the others were... decent. but not GOOD. Would argue about Divines Lament and Dancing with Source (Tambula version) but they also were kinda iffy

text: i have done the main story and side quest nearly 6 times since bought it. well. its only 5 month and I can say so far - This game is a REVOLUTION for RPG genre. Larian studios started work on 2 new RPG game progects. This game ws only a test to see how people will rate this kind of game. No need to be a gamer to say that this is the best rpg so far with a gorgeous story/music/gameplay and of course world
author: Elchin Mursalli

text: I always listen this music before I go to the bed. When I listen this music, I can feel  my childhood and nostalgia.
author: Youngshin Kim

text:
Translation for English-speaking comrades:)

You have come at the appointed hour
In the old boarded up house.
The full moon shines outside the window,
Reflected in the apples of your black eyes.

Chorus:

Who are you? Who are you?
I didn't have to wait.
Who are you? Who are you?
Who are you, the mysterious guest?

The heart is pounding, the body is shivering.
After wiping off a sudden fright,
You outline a circle on the floor with your chalk
And quietly read the spell.

In the mirror on a dirty wall,
His silhouette blinked.
A light stroke of the wing and you are gone.
A moan will drown in the silence of night.

(Chorus)

And when the star fades away,
Morning will throw a sneaf of fire in the house,
Voices will be calling for you,
But you're gone in the darkness forever.
author: Montgomery

author: fr801

text:
Kirill Pokrovsky - Mysterious Guest (Кирилл Покровский - Таинственный гость)

Ты пришла в назначенный час
В старый заколоченный дом.
Полная луна светит за окном,
Отражаясь в зрачках чёрных глаз.

Припев:

Кто ты? Кто ты?
Ждать не так долго пришлось.
Кто ты? Кто ты?
Кто ты, таинственный гость?

Сердце так стучит, в теле дрожь
Погасив минутный испуг,
Мелом на полу ты очертишь круг,
Заклинание тихо прочтёшь.

В зеркале на грязной стене
Промелькнёт его силуэт.
Лёгкий взмах крыла и тебя уж нет.
Стон потонет в ночной тишине.

А когда погаснет звезда,
Утро бросит в дом сноп огня,
Чьи-то голоса будут звать тебя,
Но ушла ты во мрак навсегда.
author: Dmitrii Ostr

text: I've been playing this game for a while. The developers have promised to add more NPC companions, and since there currently are only two available, and this drastically limits playstyle choices, I decided to wait for an update in this field before I attempt on playing the game again. Otherwise the gameplay is absolutely lovely, and they really hit the spot with the multiple routes system for completing objectives.
